short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Denominate prices in sats, instead of dollars.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bitcoin is the first constant in the financial world with a fixed supply, slow inflation to that supply cap and will slowly, but surely become the best measure of value. 

Bitcoiners need the ability to price the items they shop for in bitcoin and that is where Priced in Satoshis provides value. By converting prices denominated in $USD to satoshis (sats), the user will be able to know how many sats they could purchase instead of the item.
